class demo_source_separation.jobs.jobs.cov1svd_sqrtfn(*args, id=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: shared.jobs.jobs.LoggingJob

combination of cov1svd and sqrtfn

Attributes:

self.audio1 {np.array} – self.audio2 {np.array} – self.x {np.array} – self.state {int} – self.counter {int} –

init_job()¶

Implement this method as a normal __init__ method, but wihtout the call to the super class. Use it to hand over parameters from the config to your job.

run_job(audio1, audio2)¶

Receives the data in smaller packets. Processes them. Sends the data in smaller packets.

setup_job()¶

Implement this method as a normal setup method, but wihtout the call to the super class. Use it to initialize attributes of your job.

class demo_source_separation.jobs.jobs.sqrtfn(*args, id=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: shared.jobs.jobs.LoggingJob

What does sqrt_fn do?

Attributes:

None

init_job()¶

Implement this method as a normal __init__ method, but wihtout the call to the super class. Use it to hand over parameters from the config to your job.

run_job(input1)¶

Implement this method as a normal run method. You have to return your outputs as a tuple in the end of the method

setup_job()¶

Implement this method as a normal setup method, but wihtout the call to the super class. Use it to initialize attributes of your job.
